turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi can you put in an order at starbucks for me

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, which location are you nearest?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, do you know what you would like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk would you like in your drink?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok great, would you like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just to make sure I have this correct, a Grande caffe mocha with whole milk and whip cream

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, and can you have them add caramel syrup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want the caramel syrup in place of the vanilla syrup that's already in there or along with it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok great I have that ordered for you, it should be ready for pickup at the layton location shortly and the receipt will be sent to your phone
